title: Other game mode ranks
body:
In the old client there used to be a ranked kinda thing for Normal and ARAM.
Where are they?

replies.body:
I'm not entirely sure what you're referring to. I think you might be looking for how to find Ranked Matches for Normal/Twisted Treeline maps (ARAM has not had a ranked mode yet). I linked a quick picture of how to queue up for ranked matches, but hit me back if I've completely misunderstood your question!!

https://i.gyazo.com/538ed5fdae9f91781629b74322c873d8.png

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tc7YfnqI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-25T21:57:11.089+0000)
>
> I'm not entirely sure what you're referring to. I think you might be looking for how to find Ranked Matches for Normal/Twisted Treeline maps (ARAM has not had a ranked mode yet). I linked a quick picture of how to queue up for ranked matches, but hit me back if I've completely misunderstood your question!!
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/538ed5fdae9f91781629b74322c873d8.png

http://t07.deviantart.net/xHvYdnPjZxiU9NNU5LuMVpPi0MM=/300x200/filters:fixed_height(100,100):origin()/pre09/a508/th/pre/f/2017/147/8/2/this_by_digitalpoketmon-dbalcx1.png?1

there used to be a medal system for Classic and ARAM
where it shows how many wins, takedowns and creep score
and for ARAM it was towers destroyed, takedowns and wins i think.

(this is a reference image and is not my scores)
Ahaaa my bad! Those classic and aram stats are something we want to bring into the new client as well, but I don't have any kind of ETA on that quite yet.
The badge-looking things showings wins, takedowns, etc.? Iirc, Riot mentioned wanting to implement something like that in the new client, but it's not a priority currently.
